title: Interpretation of a vision of childbirth for a married or unmarried woman

preview.html: Interpretation of childbirth for a married woman who is not pregnant. A married woman sees that she is giving birth in a dream and she was having a difficult birth. In fact, she is not pregnant as it appears that there are many problems with her husband and they can be solved with understanding. A married woman dreams of giving birth to a child while she is not pregnant. In fact, she has shown it to be a prediction for her husband at work. Perhaps The vision indicates the presence of problems with children. The meaning of a dream about a strange child being born in a dreamWhen a married, non-pregnant woman dreams that she has given birth to a strange living being, this indicates that she has entered a new era in her life in which she is not satisfied with herself. The difficulty of giving birth to a barren married woman. A barren married woman who suffers from childlessness When she sees in her dream that she is giving birth, and the birth was difficult and not easy, this is a sign of that. Pregnancy very soon, God willing. Giving birth in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a dead child for a married woman in a dream. A married woman who has given birth before or not, if she dreams that she has given birth to a dead child. Or she died in her womb, indicating infertility and inability to have children. Perhaps the vision shows intense grief over the loss of one of her relatives or her husband in reality due to death. Giving birth in a dream of a working married woman. The work of a married woman when she dreams of giving birth is a good sign of her excellence in her work. It may It indicates that he will find a new job with a higher salary. Or it indicates that she will be promoted at work because of her competence and diligence. The vision indicates that you are hearing happy news. Birth of male twins to a married woman in a dream. When a married woman dreams that she gave birth to twins in a dream, this is evidence of fatigue and evil. It may It indicates that something bad happened to one of her family members. The vision also shows that financial insolvency is a great material for her and her husband. A dream about giving birth to twins for a married woman. See the point. Females giving birth to twins may have happy events, success, ambitions and desires. It also indicates a lot of goodness for her, her husband and her children. Male and female twins for married women. The dream indicates marital happiness For the dreamer, but there are those who hate her and want to marry her using foreign drugs. Please add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the family situation in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and interpret it.

title: Interpretation of the appearance of gray hair in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the appearance of gray hair in a dream is different according to many scholars and interpreters, as some said that it indicates a person’s dignity and high wisdom, and some scholars said that it indicates the return of the absent, and through this reference you will explain the difference. Interpretations of the appearance of gray hair in a dream or a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream or a dream? Some scholars have varied in their interpretation as follows: The appearance of gray and white hair on a person’s head. The opinion indicates his long life, in addition to explaining wisdom, dignity and rationality in taking... Right and wise decisions in many matters. If the opinion is disturbed by seeing white hair, this is explained by a weak character and inability to think and decide on various life affairs. If a young man or someone in his youth sees in a dream white hair on his head, then he must abandon the door of disobedience and sins. He resorts to repentance and worship of God Almighty and seeks forgiveness for sins and transgressions. Sins that he committed in his real life. If a rich person sees in a dream that gray hair is widely spread on his head and in different parts of his body, this indicates a great financial loss, and that his financial situation will change a lot and he will have large financial debts. And the patient who sees gray hair in A dream or a dream is interpreted as the approach of death and that the white color is the shroud, but the ages are known only to God Almighty. Whoever sees in a dream that he is removing gray hair or white hair from his head, this indicates the return of someone who has been absent for a long time and many are waiting for his return. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin in a vision Gray hair in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision in which gray hair or white hair is on the head, with some of it appearing on the decoration in the dream, in reference to the abundance of nutrition that the dreamer will bring. If the man is married, God Almighty will bless him with two girls, as Ibn Sirin said. : White hair in a dream indicates wisdom, dignity and prestige in the eyes of a person. Ibn Shirin confirmed that white hair indicates a long and long life, and that the life of one’s opinion will be a happy and stable life full of happiness and joy. As for extreme whiteness and extreme grayness with the graying of the beard as well, this It indicates distress and poverty. As for Ibn Sirin’s opinion regarding the person who dreams of removing white hair from his beard, the interpretation of this is that the person does not respect the opinion of adults, especially those who address him regarding the teachings of religion and the necessity of adhering to them. Al-Osaimi’s interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream. Fahd Al-Osaimi interpreted seeing gray hair in a dream as a symbol of age and opinion, and that one will enjoy a long life and good health as well. But if the opinion is to remove gray hair from the head, this indicates that he is working in a job that he does not like, and is not satisfied with his work. And he is not satisfied with it. As for Al-Usaimi’s interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman with gray hair in a dream, this indicates that she will give birth to a daughter, and God is Greater and All-Knowing than ever. As for a man who dreams of dyeing his hair white in a dream, the interpretation of that is that he is looking for a new job opportunity. Is it possible? To be seeing poetry

title: Interpretation of the red dress in a dream Seeing the color red in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about wearing a red dress for a pregnant woman For a married woman I dreamed that I was wearing a red dress during my marriage. Short and long for pregnant women. Interpretation of a red dress in a dream. The color red in a dream symbolizes the world, its noises and temptations, so it can symbolize anger, danger, passion, love and fertility. The appearance of the color red in a dream is accompanied by the emotions that you feel during the dream that are able to interpret this dream, especially If it has a strong effect on you when you wake up. A long or beautiful red dress in an unmarried girl’s dream expresses effective psychological energy that can be transformed into success, achievement, or excellence in professional or academic life. If you see a red dress in a dream, it symbolizes an active motivation In fact, it invites you to use some of your latent or dormant energy to support a project, activity, or desire that you want to achieve. This dream means that it is time to follow your desires and dreams. If you are single and you see yourself wearing a red dress, this foretells that you will get married soon. It is said that wearing red in an unmarried woman’s dream is not good news. Wearing red clothes in a dream symbolizes increased profits in trade Or work. If the sick person appears in a dream wearing red clothes, this indicates death. A dress in a dream generally indicates concealment and preservation, especially if the dress in the dream appears long and beautiful. As for the color red in a dream, it has many connotations. Sometimes it is the color of life and sometimes it is the color of love and desire, and often The color red in a dream expresses anger. The red color in some visions is an explicit warning to the dreamer of the consequences of making a mistake or slipping. As for the red dress, it often indicates in a dream positive energy for the dreamer, and buying it is a profit and using it is a good thing. If a woman sees a red dress in her dream, she may be very optimistic. With what she saw, the dream often carries positive messages and we will discover that respectively in the following paragraphs. Interpretation of the red dress in a pregnant woman’s dream. The red dress in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of nutrition. While the same vision in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates rest after extreme fatigue. Interpretation of the red dress In a married woman's dreamRed, if it appears in a married woman's dream, is a sign of positive energy and vitality. It is a symbol of increasing earnings and profits. It can be a sign of good luck, especially in financial matters. It is a sign of emotional harmony, affection and love between her and her husband. While A married woman who wears a short red dress in her dream predicts many problems between relatives and family in reality. The red dress in a married woman’s dream often has a positive connotation, as it is an expression of renewal in life or a positive change, a change in form that suits her desires, and the color red The dress is the color that expresses the fulfillment of desires. Interpretation of the red dress in one’s dream: For single women, the dress indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing pastries in a dream means that you are eating pastries

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing baked goods in a dream. Individuals follow Baked goods in a dream. It means that she will soon marry a good man, God willing, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is serving baked goods to someone in her dream, then this vision indicates the coming of kindness and livelihood soon. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating a large amount of bread If a married woman sees in her dream that she is preparing fresh bread, then this dream indicates the happiness that she will obtain If he saw that he was baking bread in the oven, this indicates in the summer the problems and difficulties that he will face. As for the situation, he saw that he was baking quickly, this dream indicates the arrival of kindness, abundance of sustenance, and abundant money for the dreamer. Seeing bread in the oven may mean that she is unable to take responsibility and organize the affairs of her life, And that God is the Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing bread from a baker in a dream: If a young man sees that I buy bread from a baker in his dream, this dream means that he will soon marry a good girl. Ibn Sirin says that the dream of buying white bread will achieve all his goals that he was striving for. Seeing this girl buy fino She is happy, meaning that she will get a prestigious job, God willing. A man’s quest to buy bread in a dream expresses that the dreamer is suffering from a major financial crisis and many pressures and responsibilities. Interpretation of a dream about municipal life in a dream: Al-Nabulsi sees a vision of a primary school student living in a dream and eating it while it is right out of the oven. , which indicates the strength of her faith in God. If the sleeper sees that eating a small piece of local bread in his dream means that the dreamer will suffer from a serious illness. But if he sees a mature person living with a good smell and a delicious taste, then this vision means that he will recover soon, by God’s will. Seeing a fortune teller living coffee in a dream means that he will face Many problems in his life in the coming period. The interpretation of seeing someone give me bread in a dream. Ibn Sirin suggested that seeing I give bread in a dream indicates good health enjoyed by the dreamer, and God knows best. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation is that whoever sees that he has eaten the bread that someone gave him in a dream, means He will die soon. Seeing her alone with all the bread that she took from the man with difficulty means that you will face a major financial crisis. If a man sees his wife giving him a piece of bread, this dream indicates marital happiness and family stability. Interpretation of a dream about a loaf in a dream for a single woman: seeing a free girl who ate a loaf of bread and found that it tasted delicious, and this dream indicates Her future marriage. But if she sees herself cutting a loaf in a dream, this vision shows her blind trust in people and she must be careful. If she dreams that she is eating a bunch of bread, this indicates that her life will change for the better. Visual expression: A loaf of bread. In one dream, she will achieve more success and excellence in her life. And God knows best. Interpretation of seeing fresh bread in a dream: Seeing fresh bread in a dream shows the arrival of goodness and abundance

title: Interpretation of shaking hands with someone I know in a dream

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of shaking hands with someone I know in a dream. A handshake is a way to greet and greet a person we have met in a place or when we leave that place and it is to meet with the right hands, and it is a method followed in the Arabic language and Arabic. Foreign countries as well. Many may feel this vision during their sleep. Sometimes they have certain meanings, and other times, visions are nothing more than the subconscious's expression of what is going on in a person's mind and soul. Therefore, respected dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen interpreted the vision of shaking hands with someone we know in a dream, which we will mention in an encyclopedia, so follow us.Interpretation of shaking hands with someone I know in a dream. According to what was mentioned by the scholar Ibn Sirin regarding seeing a handshake in a dream, we mention the following: A handshake and an embrace appear. Between the dreamer and someone he knows in a dream is the strength of the emotional relationship and bond between them. The refusal of the person the dreamer knows to shake hands with him in a dream shows the feelings of sadness and anguish that the dreamer is experiencing. Shaking hands with kings indicates good news that the dreamer will receive and assuming prestigious positions in society. Shaking hands with a dead king indicates in A dream indicates the return of a loved one to the dreamer from travel. The dreamer’s refusal to shake hands with someone in a dream indicates a trip close to the dreamer, and God Almighty knows best. A handshake in a dream with someone we know generally symbolizes the psychological and emotional stability that the dreamer feels. A handshake in a dream with someone we know generally symbolizes the psychological and emotional stability that the dreamer feels. Dream about NabulsiWith regard to a dreamer shaking hands with someone he knows in a dream, Imam Nabulsi says the following: Shaking hands with an enemy in a dream indicates the end of hostility and the beginning of a relationship full of friendship and love between them. Shaking hands with an old man whom the fortuneteller knows in life is good news in marrying a good girl. Seeing handshakes and kisses In a dream with the deceased, it indicates that the dreamer misses him. Shaking hands with someone the dreamer knows in a dream symbolizes the expected goodness and benefit for the dreamer, and God Almighty knows best. Shaking hands with someone I know in an individual dream. In the following points we mention the interpretation of seeing a single woman in a dream shaking hands with someone she knows: Shaking hands with someone One to someone you know in a dream indicates the benefit and goodness that she will get from this person in reality. Seeing an unmarried woman indicates that she is shaking hands with a woman and she is beautiful. A simple handshake with a married man in her dream symbolizes her desire to be associated with someone with the same characteristics. Shaking hands with parents in The dream is good news that the date of her engagement or marriage is approaching, if she is engaged. Shaking hands with a dead person in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes the purity of her heart and good behavior among people. An unmarried woman shaking hands with someone traveling in a dream indicates the changes and transformations that he is going through in his real life. Shaking hands with someone I know him in a married dream. Shaking hands with one’s father and kissing him in a married woman’s dream indicates the livelihood, happiness, and blessings she will receive in the future of her family and her professional life. A married woman shaking hands with her husband in a dream indicates stability in her married life and the end of the argument, if it exists. Shaking hands with someone I know is a solution.

Foreign countries as well. Many may feel this vision during their sleep. Sometimes they have certain meanings, and other times, visions are nothing more than the subconscious's expression of what is going on in a person's mind and soul. Therefore, respected dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen interpreted the vision of shaking hands with someone we know in a dream, which we will mention in an encyclopedia, so follow us.Interpretation of shaking hands with someone I know in a dream. Between the dreamer and someone he knows in a dream is the strength of the emotional relationship and bond between them. The refusal of the person the dreamer knows to shake hands with him in a dream shows the feelings of sadness and anguish that the dreamer is experiencing. Shaking hands with kings indicates good news that the dreamer will receive and assuming prestigious positions in society. Shaking hands with a dead king indicates in A dream indicates the return of a loved one to the dreamer from travel. Seeing handshakes and kisses In a dream with the deceased, it indicates that the dreamer misses him. Shaking hands with someone the dreamer knows in a dream symbolizes the expected goodness and benefit for the dreamer, and God Almighty knows best. title: Interpretation of cake in a dream and tower in a dream

preview.html: Watching cakes for single women, pregnant women, and married women, Eid cakes with cream, chocolate, biscuits, cakes made of sugar, and cake making by Ibn Sirin. Cake in a dream Cakes and cakes are sweets that many people love, and seeing them in a dream symbolizes many associations. We will learn about it through the interpretation of major scholars and according to the condition of the fortuneteller and the type of sweets. Interpretation of a cake in a dream Seeing a cake in a dream means kindness, surprises, livelihood, good reputation, and good management. Seeing white cake in a dream means kindness, making things easier, comfort, good news, and comfort. From anxiety. If you see a chocolate cake in a dream, this indicates kindness, a change in circumstances, pleasure, livelihood, and relief from anxiety. Seeing a pink cake indicates a change in circumstances, pleasure, surprises, and relief from the problem. Seeing a black cake in a dream means comfort after Fatigue, change of circumstances, and comfort for those who were in distress. Seeing cake in yellow indicates fatigue, gossip, and anxiety. Seeing rotten cake is to see loss, fatigue, and difference. Seeing eating cakes is for good, changed circumstances, nourishment, good news, and relief from worries. Seeing a cake market is for In correcting things, resolving differences and surprises, and alleviating adversities. Seeing a gift of cake in a dream means dissatisfaction with yourself. Seeing preparing a cake indicates kindness, pleasure, and fixing things. Seeing a cake for a pregnant woman indicates kindness, improvement in matters, living, and rest from fatigue. Seeing many cakes It means kindness, pleasure, nourishment, good news, and relief from worries. Seeing a big cake indicates surprises, a change in circumstances, and a good reputation. Seeing cake cream indicates kindness, a kind word, ease of things, and relief from worries. Seeing cake batter or cake kneading indicates kindness, new actions, pleasure, surprises, and changes in circumstances. Seeing a box of cakes or a box of cakes indicates kindness, almost surprises and good things. Seeing a cake with strawberries shows kindness, relief from fatigue, fairness in domestic affairs, and relief from worries. Seeing a fruit cake indicates a change in circumstances, good health and a solution. Conflicts Seeing cake for a married woman or married couples is for good, goodness, good news, good reputation, relief from worries. If you see cake in your dream, it means kindness, surprises, livelihood and good reputation. If you see cakes with white cream, this symbolizes facilitation of pending matters, relief and comfort. After worrySome interpretations sometimes indicate that it is good news about the marriage of an unmarried woman. Chocolate cake symbolizes kindness, a change in material circumstances, and pleasure. A dream about a pink cake portends pleasant surprises in the fall, while a yellow cake symbolizes fatigue, gossip, and anxiety. Seeing a rotten cake is interpreted through loss and fatigue And the differencesIf you see that you are eating k

title: Interpretation of seeing olives in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dream about olives in a dream, here in our article today is the interpretation of seeing a dream about olives in a dream, a person sees in a dream things that may seem very strange and wakes up from his sleep without understanding the meaning of what he saw in the dream, is it good or bad, is he optimistic? Or is he expecting something unpleasant to happen?! In this dream, olives are seen in many forms and in different circumstances. So what does it mean for a person to see olives in a dream, and is it a good dream or not? In this article, we will discuss visions of olives and the interpretations contained therein, as reported by dream interpretation scholars.Interpretation of seeing a dream of olives in a dreamIf a man sees green olives in a dream, this indicates a permissible diet and abundant goodness. If he sees black olives, this indicates little livelihood, and if his wife is pregnant, this means that she will give birth to a son. If an unmarried woman or an unmarried young man sees green olives, this indicates a close marriage with a good partner. If a girl sees black olives in her dream, it means that she will have important opportunities in life, whether at work or in marriage. If a married woman sees green olives in a dream, it means that she will hear happy news very soon. If she sees black olives in her dream, this means that she will face a series of family problems, but she will be able to overcome them. If a pregnant woman sees green olives in a dream, this may indicate that she will enjoy a stable pregnancy and give birth naturally, and if she sees black olives, this It means that she will face some problems during pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing olives for single and pregnant women. If a person sees an olive tree in his dream, this means goodness and blessing. If he sees that he is burning an olive tree, this indicates that he will perform a forbidden act and will regret it. If an unmarried girl sees an olive tree, this indicates her marriage to a good and wealthy man who fears God in it. If a married woman sees an olive tree, then her husband is a good man and will earn A livelihood. If a pregnant woman sees an olive tree, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy. Interpretation of a vision of picking olivesInterpretation of a vision of picking olives If a man sees that he is picking green olives, this indicates his good condition and removes problems and worries. If he sees that he is picking olives and someone helps him, then this person will find someone to help him in financial distress. If an unmarried girl sees that she is climbing an olive tree, this indicates a degree of distress that she will face, but she will get rid of it. If a married woman sees that she is distributing olives in a dream This indicates that she will become pregnant soon. If a pregnant woman sees that she is picking olives, this indicates that her due date is approaching. Interpretation of seeing olive branches: If a man sees olive branches, this indicates his relationship with his parents, brothers, sons, or nephews, according to what he sees in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees branches of an olive tree, this indicates that her marriage is approaching. If a married woman sees branches of an olive tree, this indicates her adherence to her religion. Interpretation of seeing olive pickles for a married girl and a pregnant woman. If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating pickles,

title: Interpretation of seeing facial pimples in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of pimples on a bachelor’s face in a dream? It may mean that he will marry a good girl. Do you see pimples appearing on a man’s face? An indication of prestige, dignity, prestige and strength. What is the meaning of liquid coming out of pimples on the face? An indication of the collapse of the fears that a woman experiences. The meaning of seeing a black woman with pimples A sign of mistakes. A lot of pimples on a corpse? Evidence that he is exposed to problems and crises. What is the interpretation of seeing absolute pimples on the face? Evidence of the appearance of happy events. What is the interpretation of seeing a man with pimples and pimples? Dignity, status, and prestige, and God knows best. Do you see red bumps on All over your body? Signs of serious health conditions. Interpretation of seeing pimples on the face in a dream. If an unmarried young man sees pimples on his face in his dream, this means that he will marry a good girl. If a pregnant woman sees pimples on her face, this is evidence of the approaching date of childbirth. While seeing the appearance of Pimples on the face in a man’s dream: the components of prestige, dignity, prestige and power. When a married woman sees pimples on the face, this indicates marital happiness and family cohesion. Seeing an unmarried girl with many pimples on her face indicates her marriage to a good man, God willing. This vision in a dream can also indicate To the good qualities of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing red pimples on the face in a dream. If a single woman sees red pimples on her face, this may indicate that she will enter into a successful romantic relationship. In the case of a married man who sees red pimples on his face, this is evidence of an abundance of money. It could This vision also indicates in a dream the formation of successful social relationships in the coming period, God willing. When she sees red pimples on the face for pregnant women, it may mean that she will give birth to a beautiful girl. The appearance of red pimples on the face of a divorced woman in a dream is evidence that her marriage is approaching. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing a young man with pimples on his face Red symbolizes beautiful feelings of love. Facial pimples in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees facial pimples in a dream, it is a sign of upcoming happy events. While seeing liquid coming out of facial pimples is evidence of the collapse of the worries that the woman suffers from. But if she sees a lot of pimples on her face, It may mean that she will hear good news soon. Never see yellow pimples on the face. This is a sign of a serious illness. In a divorced woman’s dream, this vision can also indicate the fulfillment of dreams and desires. Interpretation scholars believe that seeing pimples on the face in a dream is a sign of purity and chastity. Interpretation of white pills in a dream: If the dreamer sees white pills in his dream, this is evidence of nutrition, kindness, and comfort. If a married woman sees white pills in her stomach, this is a sign of approaching pregnancy. While seeing white pills in a dream is evidence of spending money on useless things. When the sleeper sees White pimples on his face are evidence of good deeds. Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing white pimples in a dream indicates the reputation of the fortuneteller. It can also indicate the presence of white pimples on the body, to pay off the fortuneteller’s debts.

title: Interpretation of seeing sweat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a race in a dream is one of the dreams that confuses the dreamer a lot, so he tries to search for an interpretation from which he can extract the message that this vision symbolizes. We present these visions as a general indication through which it is possible to determine what the vision can express without conclusion so that the dreamer does not follow the wrong conclusion, because the interpretation of dreams has many factors that do not depend only on the details of the vision he saw, and the dream interpreter needs to know many details about the dreamer to be able to help him. In the interpretation of his visions.Interpretation of seeing sweat in a dreamInterpretation of seeing sweat in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing sweat in a dream deserves praise and indicates the worries and problems that the dreamer will get rid of, solve, and improve conditions for the better - God willing. Ibn Sirin also says that the smell of sweat is absent. In a dream or sweat in which the dreamer does not feel alienated, this vision is considered a benign vision. As for the unpleasant smell of sweat in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer does many things that do not please God - the Great and Great. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream Seeing sweat in a dream Al-Nabulsi: Imam Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing sweat in a dream indicates that the patient who sees this dream is good news for him that he is approaching recovery - God willing -. Also, this vision can be an indication that the dreamer is committing many sins and sins against the will of God. Also When he dreams of an unpleasant smell of sweat in the armpit area, this warns the dreamer of possible crises that could happen to him with someone from the family. See also: Backgrounds in a dream Seeing sweat in a single woman’s dream Interpretation of seeing sweat in a dream for a single girl who sees someone she knows dripping a lot Of sweat, this indicates that this man will get a great job that he was looking for. To see an unmarried girl in a dream sitting under a tree with a lot of sweat, this indicates that this girl is seeking knowledge. Just like an unmarried girl sitting next to her mother in a dream and seeing... A lot of sweat, this indicates that this girl has a large and extensive diet - God willing -. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Seeing sweat in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who dreams that she is working hard, tired, and sweaty, indicates that she is trying to maintain her home and that She will have a high status. Just as you see a married woman in a dream working hard and with great effort, this indicates a lot of goodness that she will achieve with her family - God willing -. See also: Seeing pins in a dream Seeing sweat in a dream for a man The interpretation of seeing sweat in a dream For someone who sees that he is working very hard and that there is heavy sweat, this indicates that he is serious about searching for something that he can - God willing - achieve. And like someone who dreams of sitting in the sun and with intense sweating on his forehead, this indicates that this person has worked for a long time and after that he rested - God willing - As for the man who is talking in the dream with one of his acquaintances and feeling tired and having...
